clusters.title: Clusters
clusters.tooltip: Total number of clusters connected to AMD Resource Manager.

gpuNodes.title: GPU Nodes
gpuNodes.tooltip: Number of nodes on the connected clusters which have a detectable GPU.

availableGPUs.title: Available GPUs
availableGPUs.tooltip: The total number of GPUs detected across all nodes on clusters connected to AMD Resource Manager.

allocatedGPUs.title: Allocated GPUs
allocatedGPUs.tooltip: The number of GPUs, across nodes, which have been allocated via quotas to different projects.

gpuUtilization.title: GPU Utilization
gpuUtilization.tooltip: Number of GPUs currently in use.

runningWorkloads.title: Running Workloads
runningWorkloads.tooltip: Number of running workloads in all the clusters.

pendingWorkloads.title: Pending Workloads
pendingWorkloads.tooltip: Number of pending workloads in all the clusters.
